nodes.text: A Dantooine ice-twist was a type of beverage that was served on Zeltros. There, Doctor Chelli Aphra was served one before she asked for another when one of her adversaries, Tukan, confronted her.
The Dantooine ice-twist first appeared in the canon comic Doctor Aphra 13, written by Kieron Gillen, illustrated by Kev Walker and released on October 11 2017.
